name: Fading Visage
description: Where am I? This place frightens me. How can I get out of here? I've lost my way in a thick fog. Wherever I go, I keep coming back here, again and again, as if I have to finish something. I can dimly remember that I've been here already...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
